title: solo / duo not showing over flex
body:
hello riot, 
i would rather have my solo/duo show over my flex.  i rarely play flex anymore and i passed my flex, a couple divisions over now, so i would prefer to show my solo/duo over flex

replies.body: Your profile page is meant to show your highest rank. We've noticed that this isn't working correctly for some, but we're still in the process of looking into what exactly has been going wrong.
